===Interactables===
====Ancient Engravings====
This interactable is found in the cavern beneath Clivus Capitolinum, just north of the Local Legend Cineas.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Ancient Engravings:''' "...By order of exalted Harmost [[Boethius]], receive the Dragonborn envoys to discuss cooperation..."
:'''Ancient Engravings:''' (The following lines of text have been brutally struck out by a sharp implement and cannot be read.)
:'''Messy Inscription:''' "Traitor. Traitor. Traitor. Traitor. Traitor. Traitor. Traitor."
:'''Ancient Engravings:''' "Sink into this immortal prison with us, xenoproles."
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* From the Latin term of the same name, ''{{w|Clivus Capitolinum}}'', referring to the main road to the Roman Capitol. It ran from the {{w|Roman Forum}} up the slope of {{w|Capitoline Hill}} to the {{w|Temple of Jupiter Capitolinus}}.
